description: Find many great new & used options and get the best deals for Alien Resurrection (Sony PlayStation 1, 2000) at the best online prices at eBay! Free shipping for many products!
opinions: This game takes me back to my childhood. If you liked the movie (I thought it was okay...but loved the movie series, ESPECIALLY Alien 1 & 2), then this game is for you. The graphics are good too considering it is for the first playstation.
